column1: (2A)  At  any  time  prior  to  the  entering  of  judgment  against  a  defendant  for
default,  the  court  may,  if  the  plaintiff  consents,  but  not  otherwise,  set  aside
any order made on the basis of the default of the defendant and permit him to
proceed  with  his  defence  as from  the  stage  of  default  upon  such  terms  as  to
costs or otherwise as to the court shall appear fit.
